Package ohos.rpc

Class RemoteProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.rpc.RemoteProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRemoteObject

    public class RemoteProxy
extends Object
implements IRemoteObject
    Implements IRemoteObject proxy objects.
    Since:
    1

        Returns:

      • addDeathRecipient

        public boolean addDeathRecipient​(IRemoteObject.DeathRecipient recipient,
                                 int flags)
        Registers a callback used to receive death notifications of a remote object.
        Specified by:
        addDeathRecipient in interface IRemoteObject
        Parameters:
        recipient - Indicates the callback to be registered.
        flags - Indicates the flag of the death notification. This is a reserved parameter. Set it to 0.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the callback is registered successfully; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        1

        Parameters:

      • sendRequest

        public boolean sendRequest​(int code,
                           MessageParcel data,
                           MessageParcel reply,
                           MessageOption option)
                    throws RemoteException
        Sends a request to the peer object.

        If the peer object and RemoteProxy are on the same device, the request is sent by the IPC driver. If they are on different devices, the request is sent by the socket driver.

        Specified by:
        sendRequest in interface IRemoteObject
        Parameters:
        code - Indicates the message code of the request.
        data - Indicates the MessageParcel object storing the data to be sent.
        reply - Indicates the MessageParcel object receiving the response data.
        option - Indicates a synchronous (default) or asynchronous request.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the operation succeeds; returns false otherwise.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - Throws this exception if a remote object exception occurs.
        Since:
        1

      • dump

        public void dump​(FileDescriptor fd,
                 String[] args)
          throws RemoteException
        Dumps the status of the current interface to a file with a specific descriptor.
        Specified by:
        dump in interface IRemoteObject
        Parameters:
        fd - Indicates the descriptor of the target file.
        args - Indicates parameters of this method in character string format.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - Throws this exception if a remote object exception occurs.
        Since:
        1

      • slowPathDump

        public void slowPathDump​(FileDescriptor fd,
                         String[] args)
                  throws RemoteException
        Asynchronously dumps data to a specified file.

        This method applies only to data dump on the same device.

        You need to obtain the file descriptor from the file and close the file descriptor after the dump is complete.

        Specified by:
        slowPathDump in interface IRemoteObject
        Parameters:
        fd - Indicates the file descriptor of the target file.
        args - Indicates the arguments (an array of strings) to dump.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - Throws this exception if the dump command fails to be sent or an error occurs during the dump.
        Since:
        5

      • isObjectDead

        public boolean isObjectDead​()
        Checks whether the RemoteObject corresponding to a RemoteProxy is dead.
        Specified by:
        isObjectDead in interface IRemoteObject
        Returns:
        Returns true if the RemoteObject is dead; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        1

      • getIdentity

        public long getIdentity​()
        Obtains the ID of this RemoteProxy object.

        RemoteProxy objects with the same ID are deemed as equal.

        Returns:
        Returns the unique ID of this RemoteProxy object.
        Since:
        3

      • equals

        public boolean equals​(Object object)
        Checks whether the object calling this method equals the specified object.

        Objects with the same address or ID are deemed as equal. You can use getIdentity() to obtain the ID of the RemoteProxy object.

        Overrides:
        equals in class Object
        Parameters:
        object - Indicates the object to compare.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the two objects are equal; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Object.hashCode(), HashMap
